title: How to Install CloudSync Pro on Windows
content:
# Installing CloudSync Pro on Windows

## System Requirements
- Windows operating system (latest version recommended)
- At least 2GB of free disk space
- Internet connection for download and activation

## Installation Steps

1. **Download the installer**
   - Visit our official website at www.example.com
   - Navigate to Downloads section
   - Select CloudSync Pro for Windows

2. **Run the installer**
   - Locate the downloaded file in your Downloads folder
   - Double-click to run the installer
   - Follow the on-screen instructions

3. **Complete setup**
   - Enter your license key when prompted
   - Choose installation directory (default recommended)
   - Click 'Install' and wait for completion

4. **First launch**
   - Launch CloudSync Pro from your applications menu
   - Sign in with your account credentials
   - Complete the initial setup wizard

## Troubleshooting Installation Issues

If you encounter any problems during installation:
- Ensure you have administrator privileges
- Disable antivirus temporarily
- Check firewall settings
- Contact support if issues persist

title: CloudSync Pro: Sync not working
content:
# Sync not working in CloudSync Pro

## Problem Description
Sync not working

## Solution
Check your internet connection and ensure the app has necessary permissions. Go to Settings > Sync and click "Force Sync". If the issue persists, try signing out and signing back in.

## Additional Tips
- Make sure you're running the latest version of CloudSync Pro
- Check system requirements are met
- Try restarting the application
- Contact support if the issue persists

title: CloudSync Pro: Files not uploading
content:
# Files not uploading in CloudSync Pro

## Problem Description
Files not uploading

## Solution
Verify you have sufficient storage space in your account. Check if the file size exceeds the 5GB limit per file. Also ensure the file format is supported.

## Additional Tips
- Make sure you're running the latest version of CloudSync Pro
- Check system requirements are met
- Try restarting the application
- Contact support if the issue persists

title: CloudSync Pro: Slow sync speed
content:
# Slow sync speed in CloudSync Pro

## Problem Description
Slow sync speed

## Solution
Try pausing other uploads/downloads. Check your internet speed. Consider upgrading to our Pro plan for faster sync speeds and priority bandwidth.

## Additional Tips
- Make sure you're running the latest version of CloudSync Pro
- Check system requirements are met
- Try restarting the application
- Contact support if the issue persists

title: DataVault: Backup fails
content:
# Backup fails in DataVault

## Problem Description
Backup fails

## Solution
Ensure you have enough free disk space. Check if the backup destination is accessible. Verify your backup schedule settings and try running a manual backup.

## Additional Tips
- Make sure you're running the latest version of DataVault
- Check system requirements are met
- Try restarting the application
- Contact support if the issue persists

title: DataVault: Cannot restore files
content:
# Cannot restore files in DataVault

## Problem Description
Cannot restore files

## Solution
Make sure you're signed in with the correct account. Verify the backup exists in your backup history. Check file permissions on the restore destination.

## Additional Tips
- Make sure you're running the latest version of DataVault
- Check system requirements are met
- Try restarting the application
- Contact support if the issue persists

title: DataVault: Encryption password forgotten
content:
# Encryption password forgotten in DataVault

## Problem Description
Encryption password forgotten

## Solution
Unfortunately, encryption passwords cannot be recovered for security reasons. You will need to create a new backup with a new password. We recommend using a password manager.

## Additional Tips
- Make sure you're running the latest version of DataVault
- Check system requirements are met
- Try restarting the application
- Contact support if the issue persists

title: TeamChat: Cannot send messages
content:
# Cannot send messages in TeamChat

## Problem Description
Cannot send messages

## Solution
Check your internet connection. Verify you have permission to post in the channel. Try refreshing the app or clearing cache in Settings > Advanced.

## Additional Tips
- Make sure you're running the latest version of TeamChat
- Check system requirements are met
- Try restarting the application
- Contact support if the issue persists

title: TeamChat: Notifications not working
content:
# Notifications not working in TeamChat

## Problem Description
Notifications not working

## Solution
Go to Settings > Notifications and ensure they are enabled. Check your device notification settings for TeamChat. On mobile, verify the app has notification permissions.

## Additional Tips
- Make sure you're running the latest version of TeamChat
- Check system requirements are met
- Try restarting the application
- Contact support if the issue persists

title: TeamChat: Video call quality issues
content:
# Video call quality issues in TeamChat

## Problem Description
Video call quality issues

## Solution
Ensure you have a stable internet connection (minimum 5 Mbps recommended). Close other bandwidth-heavy applications. Try switching from Wi-Fi to ethernet if possible.

## Additional Tips
- Make sure you're running the latest version of TeamChat
- Check system requirements are met
- Try restarting the application
- Contact support if the issue persists

title: ProjectHub: Cannot create new project
content:
# Cannot create new project in ProjectHub

## Problem Description
Cannot create new project

## Solution
Check if you've reached your project limit on your current plan. Verify you have admin or creator permissions in your workspace. Try refreshing the page.

## Additional Tips
- Make sure you're running the latest version of ProjectHub
- Check system requirements are met
- Try restarting the application
- Contact support if the issue persists

title: ProjectHub: Tasks not updating
content:
# Tasks not updating in ProjectHub

## Problem Description
Tasks not updating

## Solution
Make sure you have the latest version of the app. Clear browser cache or reinstall mobile app. Check if you're in offline mode.

## Additional Tips
- Make sure you're running the latest version of ProjectHub
- Check system requirements are met
- Try restarting the application
- Contact support if the issue persists

title: ProjectHub: Cannot invite team members
content:
# Cannot invite team members in ProjectHub

## Problem Description
Cannot invite team members

## Solution
Verify you have admin permissions. Check if the email address is correct. Ensure your workspace hasn't reached the user limit for your plan.

## Additional Tips
- Make sure you're running the latest version of ProjectHub
- Check system requirements are met
- Try restarting the application
- Contact support if the issue persists

title: CloudSync Pro: Selective Sync
content:
# Selective Sync in CloudSync Pro

## Overview
Choose which folders to sync to your device. This saves disk space by keeping files in the cloud only. Right-click any folder and select "Sync Settings" to configure.

## How to Use
1. Open CloudSync Pro
2. Navigate to the Selective Sync section
3. Follow the in-app instructions

## Tips and Best Practices
- Use this feature regularly to get the most value
- Explore all available options in settings
- Check our video tutorials for detailed walkthroughs

title: CloudSync Pro: File Versioning
content:
# File Versioning in CloudSync Pro

## Overview
Access previous versions of your files for up to 30 days. Right-click any file and select "Version History" to view and restore older versions.

## How to Use
1. Open CloudSync Pro
2. Navigate to the File Versioning section
3. Follow the in-app instructions

## Tips and Best Practices
- Use this feature regularly to get the most value
- Explore all available options in settings
- Check our video tutorials for detailed walkthroughs

title: CloudSync Pro: Share Links
content:
# Share Links in CloudSync Pro

## Overview
Create shareable links for files and folders. Set expiration dates and password protection for enhanced security. Find this option in the right-click menu.

## How to Use
1. Open CloudSync Pro
2. Navigate to the Share Links section
3. Follow the in-app instructions

## Tips and Best Practices
- Use this feature regularly to get the most value
- Explore all available options in settings
- Check our video tutorials for detailed walkthroughs

title: DataVault: Incremental Backup
content:
# Incremental Backup in DataVault

## Overview
Only backup files that have changed since the last backup, saving time and bandwidth. This is enabled by default but can be configured in Backup Settings.

## How to Use
1. Open DataVault
2. Navigate to the Incremental Backup section
3. Follow the in-app instructions

## Tips and Best Practices
- Use this feature regularly to get the most value
- Explore all available options in settings
- Check our video tutorials for detailed walkthroughs

title: DataVault: Scheduled Backups
content:
# Scheduled Backups in DataVault

## Overview
Set automatic backup schedules (daily, weekly, monthly). Configure in Settings > Backup Schedule. We recommend daily backups for important data.

## How to Use
1. Open DataVault
2. Navigate to the Scheduled Backups section
3. Follow the in-app instructions

## Tips and Best Practices
- Use this feature regularly to get the most value
- Explore all available options in settings
- Check our video tutorials for detailed walkthroughs

title: DataVault: Backup Verification
content:
# Backup Verification in DataVault

## Overview
Automatically verify backup integrity after each backup completes. Enable in Settings > Advanced > Verification to ensure your backups are reliable.

## How to Use
1. Open DataVault
2. Navigate to the Backup Verification section
3. Follow the in-app instructions

## Tips and Best Practices
- Use this feature regularly to get the most value
- Explore all available options in settings
- Check our video tutorials for detailed walkthroughs

title: FAQ: How much storage do I get?
content:
# Frequently Asked Question

## Question
How much storage do I get?

## Answer
Free accounts get 5GB of storage. Pro accounts include 1TB of storage. Enterprise plans offer unlimited storage.

title: FAQ: Can I access files offline?
content:
# Frequently Asked Question

## Question
Can I access files offline?

## Answer
Yes! Mark any file or folder as "Available Offline" and it will be stored on your device for offline access.

title: FAQ: What file types are supported?
content:
# Frequently Asked Question

## Question
What file types are supported?

## Answer
All file types are supported. However, preview is only available for common formats like images, videos, PDFs, and Office documents.

title: FAQ: How secure are my backups?
content:
# Frequently Asked Question

## Question
How secure are my backups?

## Answer
All backups are encrypted with AES-256 encryption before leaving your device. Only you have the decryption key.

title: FAQ: Can I backup external drives?
content:
# Frequently Asked Question

## Question
Can I backup external drives?

## Answer
Yes! You can add external drives as backup sources. Make sure the drive is connected when backup runs.

title: FAQ: How long are backups retained?
content:
# Frequently Asked Question

## Question
How long are backups retained?

## Answer
Free accounts: 30 days. Pro accounts: 1 year. Enterprise: Custom retention policies available.

title: FAQ: Is there a mobile app?
content:
# Frequently Asked Question

## Question
Is there a mobile app?

## Answer
Yes! TeamChat is available on iOS and Android. Download from the App Store or Google Play.

title: FAQ: Can I integrate with other tools?
content:
# Frequently Asked Question

## Question
Can I integrate with other tools?

## Answer
Yes! We integrate with 100+ tools including Google Drive, Trello, GitHub, and more. Check Settings > Integrations.

title: FAQ: What's the difference between Free and Pro?
content:
# Frequently Asked Question

## Question
What's the difference between Free and Pro?

## Answer
Pro includes unlimited message history, video calls up to 50 people, priority support, and advanced admin controls. Free is limited to 10,000 messages.

title: FAQ: How many projects can I create?
content:
# Frequently Asked Question

## Question
How many projects can I create?

## Answer
Free: 3 projects. Pro: Unlimited projects. Enterprise: Unlimited with advanced features.

title: FAQ: Can I import from other tools?
content:
# Frequently Asked Question

## Question
Can I import from other tools?

## Answer
Yes! We support import from Trello, Asana, Jira, and CSV files. Go to Project Settings > Import.

title: FAQ: Do you offer API access?
content:
# Frequently Asked Question

## Question
Do you offer API access?

## Answer
Yes! API access is available on Pro and Enterprise plans. Documentation at developers.projecthub.com
